titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-P-561
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-P-561

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

1.[ʾĪl]īsamaʿ Dhubyān bin Ma[lkī]karib, King of Ḥaḍramōt, has dedicated to ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim the tower of Kharīf, (i.e.) the tower which ʿAlhān bin Yadaʿʾīl, King of Ḥaḍramōt, had built with him. 2.[By] ʿAthtar Dhū-[Qab]ḍim and [by Si]yyān and by [Wa]ddum [and by Nakraḥum and by] his brother ʾAbīyadaʿ Yithaʿ, King of Maʿīnum; and by his tribe of Maʿīnum. And ʾĪlīsama[ʿ] has placed under the protection of ʿAthtar Dhū-Qa- 3.bḍim and Siyyān [and] Waddum and Nakraḥum himself [and his faculties and] his son and his property.

ʾĪlīsamaʿ Dhubyān bin Malkīkarib, King of Ḥaḍramōt, has dedicated to ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim the tower of Kharīf, i.e. the tower which ʿAlhān bin Yadaʿʾīl, King of Ḥaḍramōt, had built with him.
By ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim and by Siyyān and by Waddum and by Nakraḥum and by his brother ʾAbīyadaʿ Yithaʿ, King of Maʿīnum; and by his tribe of Maʿīnum. And ʾĪlīsamaʿ has placed under the protection of ʿAthtar Dhū-Qa-
bḍim and Siyyān and Waddum and Nakraḥum himself and his faculties and his son and his property.

ʾĪlīsamaʿ Dhubyān bin Malkīkarib, King of Ḥaḍramōt, has dedicated to ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim the tower of Kharīf, i.e. the tower which ʿAlhān bin Yadaʿʾīl, King of Ḥaḍramōt, had built with him.
By ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim and by Siyyān and by Waddum and by Nakraḥum and by his brother ʾAbīyadaʿ Yithaʿ, King of Maʿīnum; and by his tribe of Maʿīnum. And ʾĪlīsamaʿ has placed under the protection of ʿAthtar Dhū-Qa-
bḍim and Siyyān and Waddum and Nakraḥum himself and his faculties and his son and his property.

ʾĪlīsamaʿ Dhubyān bin Malkīkarib, King of Ḥaḍramōt, has dedicated to ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim the tower of Kharīf, i.e. the tower which ʿAlhān bin Yadaʿʾīl, King of Ḥaḍramōt, had built with him.
By ʿAthtar Dhū-Qabḍim and by Siyyān and by Waddum and by Nakraḥum and by his brother ʾAbīyadaʿ Yithaʿ, King of Maʿīnum; and by his tribe of Maʿīnum. And ʾĪlīsamaʿ has placed under the protection of ʿAthtar Dhū-Qa-
bḍim and Siyyān and Waddum and Nakraḥum himself and his faculties and his son and his property.
